display-name.lang: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland

programme.title: The Muddy Roots of Football - Part 1
programme.desc: Following a football team in the highlands of Ireland made of members of the same family who speak a language that none of their opponents understand.

programme.title: The Muddy Roots of Football - Part 2
programme.desc: A profile of an amateur Romanian football team forced to transplant a football pitch from a nearby village because of pollution created by industrial activity.

programme.title: The Muddy Roots of Football - Part 3
programme.desc: With a cemetery behind one of the goals, this is where players of Vilar de Barrio play. The clay pitch is described as the 'worst in Spain' and the coach is running for mayor.

programme.title: The Muddy Roots of Football - Part 4
programme.desc: In Ireland, a home captain recounts the previous night's Christmas party, and a tight and terrible game ends with the captain getting told off by his mother.

programme.title: The Muddy Roots of Football - Part 5
programme.desc: Witness the remarkable journey of the one-armed goalkeeper who has defied all odds and refuses to give up.

programme.title: The Muddy Roots of Football - Part 6
programme.desc: On the Arctic Circle, a special annual match unfolds, where 86-year-old players from neighboring villages battle it out for one last time.

programme.title: Classic Premier League
programme.desc: A review of the 2014/15 season. Eden Hazard's superb form helped Chelsea clinch their fifth title and newly-promoted Burnley and QPR made immediate returns to the Championship.

programme.title: Classic Premier League
programme.desc: A review of the 2015/16 season. Leicester City shocked the footballing world, Jose Mourinho's second tenure at Chelsea came to an end and Newcastle dropped into the second tier.

programme.title: Premier League Legends
programme.desc: This episode profiles Robert Pires, who was an ever-present and iconic figure in Arsenal's Invincibles team and went on to make 189 appearances for the Gunners.

programme.title: Live: Riyadh Season Snooker Championship

programme.title: College Football Live
programme.desc: Want to know up-to-the-minute reports about your favorite college football team? ESPN has it covered with this weekday studio show, a roundtable format that emphasizes discussion and opinions on the sport's biggest stories and newsmakers. The half-hour program features a rotating roster of analysts that includes coaches, former players, and media personalities.

programme.title: Live: Pardon the Interruption
programme.desc: The debate is the story in this fast-paced, half-hour series hosted by former Washington Post sportswriters Tony Kornheiser and Michael Wilbon. The pair engage in high-energy discussions, conduct interviews and often argue over topics not even related to sports. Other sports reporters appear as guests and offer opinions on the top stories of the day.

programme.title: 2025 Grey Cup
programme.desc: The Alouettes and Roughriders duel in the 112th Grey Cup. Both teams needed semifinal heroics, with Tommy Nield's touchdown catch with 12 seconds left getting Saskatchewan by BC 24-21, while Montreal upset Hamilton 19-16 on a last-second field goal.

programme.title: NFL Live
programme.desc: Host Laura Rutledge takes the helm of this weekday show featuring the likes of Marcus Spears, Dan Orlovsky, Mina Kimes, and Adam Schefter. The "NFL Live" crew entertains fans while offering all the latest news and analysis from across the NFL.

programme.title: College Football Live
programme.desc: Want to know up-to-the-minute reports about your favorite college football team? ESPN has it covered with this weekday studio show, a roundtable format that emphasizes discussion and opinions on the sport's biggest stories and newsmakers. The half-hour program features a rotating roster of analysts that includes coaches, former players, and media personalities.

programme.title: Live: Pardon the Interruption
programme.desc: The debate is the story in this fast-paced, half-hour series hosted by former Washington Post sportswriters Tony Kornheiser and Michael Wilbon. The pair engage in high-energy discussions, conduct interviews and often argue over topics not even related to sports. Other sports reporters appear as guests and offer opinions on the top stories of the day.

programme.title: Live: NFL Football
programme.desc: The Bills face the Texans. Buffalo seeks its first victory in Houston since 2006, a run of five losses that includes a playoff defeat in 2020. Ka'imi Fairbairn's 59-yard field goal as time expired gave Houston a 23-20 win over Buffalo last season.

When a famous mystery writer dies, Athena, Bobby and the 118 respond to the chaos caused by a citywide manhunt for buried treasure the author left behind.

The members of the 118 make calls to save a bridezilla at a disastrous wedding; Hen plays medical detective when her mother falls ill; Eddie and Christopher receive a visit from Carla; Athena uncovers a secret Bobby has been hiding.
Athena and the 118 are on high alert when a sniper is targeting members of the LAFD; Maddie makes a life decision.

A series of ransomware threats leads to emergencies for the 118, including a helicopter crash at a hospital and an air traffic control tower system failure; the case of the realtor serial rapist goes to trial.
The 118 springs into action when a citywide blackout and a record heat wave causes mayhem in Los Angeles; Chimney confides in Hen about Maddie's condition; Athena's worst nightmare comes true.

As the citywide blackout continues to cause mayhem in Los Angeles, Athena races to save her family from a tragedy; Eddie must make a difficult choice about his future; Maddie makes a life-changing decision.

A truck crashes into a high school homecoming parade; Athena and Michael try to help Harry in the aftermath of his kidnapping; May is intimidated by a returning call center legend; Bobby gives a devastated Chimney advice regarding Maddie.
A man over-exerts himself exercising; a groundskeeper is cut by his chainsaw; an explosion occurs at a retirement community; May gets an emergency call from a suicidal teen.
Responding to a fire at a prison, Bobby and the 118 find themselves trapped in a deadly riot.

A man claims he was carjacked, shot and buried alive; a homeowner thinks her roommate is a ghost; Hen receives a visit from the past; Athena and family are concerned that Harry is still haunted by visions of Jeffrey.
Bobby and the 118 race to save lives after an explosion rocks the hospital where Dr. David Hale is performing surgery; Michael makes a life-changing decision.

An abandoned oil well erupts and causes a massive sinkhole in downtown LA; Athena investigates a 30-year-old cold case involving a casino robbery; Buck fears his relationship with Taylor might be ending.

programme.title: Cocaine Bear
programme.desc: An oddball group of cops, criminals, tourists and teens converges in a Georgia forest after a 500-pound black bear ingests a large amount of cocaine and goes on a drug-fueled rampage.
